```{r}
data <- read.xlsx("Base_PBM_Facteurs_Confusion.xlsx")
data
```

```{r}
# mettre les valeurs Ã  1
data[,22][data[,22]>0]=1
# supprimer les NA
library(tidyr)
data = data %>% drop_na()

data_conf <- data[,1:19]
data_conf
```

```{r}
Y <- data[,22]

# Selection
library("MASS")
mod <- glm(Y ~., family=binomial, data_conf)
stepAIC(mod, direction = "both")
```
